# containsColumn(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the data frame contains a column matching a column ID.

## Declaration

```swift
func containsColumn<T>(_ id: ColumnID<T>) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **id**: A column ID.
title: containsColumn(_:)
